src:
Keanu Reeves Pacari Alexandra Grant, Plus-Minus Kencani Sahabat
06 Nov 2019, 04:20 by Sarah Ervina Dara Siyahailatua, Yayuk Widiyarti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Setelah 20 tahun sendiri, aktor top Keanu Reeves kini ia dikabarkan tengah berpacaran dengan Alexandra Grant. Hal ini bisa dibuktikan dari kehadiran mereka di acara milik Gucci, the LACMA Art + Film Gala di Los Angeles, Amerika Serikat, pada 4 November 2019.
Melansir situs People.com, keduanya datang bersamaan di karpet merah sambil bergandengan tangan. Terlepas dari kabar bahagia tersebut, Keanu Reeves dan Alexandra Grant sudah lama bersahabat.
Tentu bukan hal mudah untuk menjalin hubungan dengan teman dekat sebab ada plus minus yang harus dihadapi. Melansir dari situs Cheat Sheet dan Bustle, berikut beberapa di antaranya.
Poin plus: Pasangan sudah mengenal luar dalamHal terbaik dari berpacaran dengan sahabat adalah keterbukaan yang sudah diketahui sejak lama sehingga tak perlu lagi berpura-pura dalam segala hal karena pasangan telah tahu bagaimana sifat asli dan cara menghadapi Anda. Dengan demikian, masalah yang nanti dihadapi dalam menjalani hubungan akan lebih mudah diatasi.
Poin minus: Melewati masa-masa indah awal pendekatanBanyak pasangan mengatakan masa terindah dalam hubungan adalah saat PDKT alias pendekatan. Dengan memacari sahabat, Anda tentu tidak akan melewati masa-masa tersebut karena dari awal memang sudah dekat. Jadi, tak ada lagi pendekatan dengan rasa deg-degan hingga berbunga-bunga.
Poin plus: Keluarga dan orang sekitar sudah kenal dengan pasanganIni adalah hal termudah untuk dihadapi karena Anda dan pasangan sudah bersahabat, keluarga dan orang sekitar pasti telah mengenal satu sama lain. Tak perlu lagi takut untuk menjelaskan dan menceritakan pasangan yang mungkin tidak disukai, bahkan disetujui oleh orang terdekat.
Poin minus: Putus artinya akan merusak persahabatanHal terburuk yang bisa dihadapi dari setiap hubungan yang tidak cocok adalah putus. Namun, ini akan semakin merugikan karena Anda tidak hanya lepas dari kekasih, tapi juga kehilangan sahabat. Anda tentu akan kesulitan untuk menceritakan keluh kesah perjalanan cinta karena tak lagi memiliki orang guna mencurahkan isi hati.
text:
Keanu Reeves Pacari Alexandra Grant, Plus-Minus Dating Friends
Nov 6 2019, 04:20 by Sarah Ervina Dara Siyahailatua, Yayuk Widiyarti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - After 20 years by himself, top actor Keanu Reeves is now reportedly in a relationship with Alexandra Grant. This can be proven from their presence at the Gucci show, the LACMA Art + Film Gala in Los Angeles, United States, on November 4, 2019.
Launch People.com site, the two came together on the red carpet while holding hands. Despite the good news, Keanu Reeves and Alexandra Grant have long been friends.
Of course it is not easy to establish relationships with close friends because there are pluses and minuses that must be faced. Launch from the Cheat Sheet and Bustle site, here are some of them.
Plus points: Couples already know the outside in The best thing about dating a friend is the openness that has been known for a long time so that you no longer need to pretend in anything because your partner already knows how to be genuine and how to deal with you. Thus, problems that will later be faced in undergoing relationships will be more easily overcome.
Minus point: Past the good times of the beginning of the approach Many couples say the most beautiful time in a relationship is when the PDKT alias approach. By dating a friend, you certainly will not go through these periods because from the beginning it was already close. So, there is no more approach with a sense of excited until flowery.
Plus points: Family and people around you are already familiar with your partner. This is the easiest thing to deal with because you and your partner are friends, family and people around you will already know each other. No need to be afraid to explain and tell a partner who might not be liked, even agreed to by the closest person.
Minus point: Breaking up means it will ruin your friendship. The worst thing that can be faced with any unsuitable relationship is breaking up. However, this will be even more detrimental because you not only separated from lovers, but also lost friends. You will certainly find it difficult to tell the complaints of a love journey because you no longer have anyone to pour out your heart.
